You gain either the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Ki Rush]{Ki Rush} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Ki Strike]{Ki Strike} monk feat, which grants you a ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Refocus]{Refocus} activity as a monk does.
